content: who you gonna call ghostbusters nah this guy is way cuter inspired by the movie you can make your own mini stay puft marshmallow man to terrorise the neighbourhood the materials required are listed below the yarn used to make him as pictured was drops paris cotton yarn in white blue and red yarn with scraps of black and red felt for the mouth detail materials required aran yarn white blue red 3 5mm crochet hook 10mm safety eyes x 2 stitch markers and pins yarn needle stuffing stitch knowledge required single_crochet = single_crochet flo = front loops only slip st = slip_stitch invdec = invisible decrease ** = a repeating stitch pattern
